actors.name: United States of America
actors.description: Global superpower with unmatched military, economic, technological, and cultural influence. Leading role in international institutions, global finance (USD dominance), and technological innovation.

actors.name: People's Republic of China
actors.description: World's largest population, second-largest economy, rising military power. Dominant in global supply chains, technology manufacturing, and increasing influence through Belt and Road Initiative.

actors.name: European Union
actors.description: Largest trading bloc, significant regulatory power ('Brussels Effect'), major diplomatic force. Combined economic might of 27 nations with substantial influence on global standards and trade.

actors.name: Apple Inc.
actors.description: World's most valuable company, enormous influence on global technology standards, consumer behavior, and digital ecosystems. Major impact on privacy standards and digital economy.

actors.name: Federal Reserve System
actors.description: US central bank with extraordinary influence over global financial markets, international monetary policy, and world economy through dollar hegemony and interest rate decisions.

actors.name: NATO
actors.description: Most powerful military alliance in history, combining forces of 31 nations. Crucial role in global security architecture and geopolitical balance of power.
